org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker

Class TokenTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker.TokenTracker

  • public class TokenTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    This is root class for whole token tracking toolkit. Token tracker instance is managed by WatchDog, so each running graph has associated a TokenTracker. All token events from all components and edges are gather by this tracker and passed to all registered event serializers.

      • executeJob

        public void executeJob(Node component,
              Token token,
              JobType jobType,
              IAuthorityProxy.RunStatus runStatus)
        Token executes a job in a component.
        Parameters:
        component - component where the token executes a job
        token - caused token
        jobType - type of executed job
        runId - run id of executed job
        settings - custom settings of executed job

      • jobFinished

               JobType jobType,
               IAuthorityProxy.RunStatus runStatus)
        Token reported a finished job in a component.
        Parameters:
        component - component where the token reports a job is finished
        token - reporting token
        jobType - type of finished job
        runId - run id of finished job
        result - custom information about finished job
